`namext` - Extract scientific names from text using gnfinder

## Install

```{r eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("ropenscilabs/namext")
```

```{r}
library("namext")
```

## xxxx

xxx

```{r}
x <- system.file("examples/BoegerEtal2015.pdf", package="namext")
name_extract(x)
```
